content.raw:
Thank you for the answer.

My fifth attempt was a bust - the simulator wouldn't start.  This seemed like the most relevant log file:
ubuntu@ip-172-31-23-53:~/code$ more cloudsim-docker.log 
xauth:  unable to generate an authority file name
xauth:  file /tmp/.docker.xauth does not exist
xauth: (argv):1:  unable to read any entries from file "(stdin)"
docker: Error response from daemon: invalid bind mount spec "/home/ubuntu/code/simulator-logs/world_1_2017-06-06T00:40:25.393Z/gazebo-logs:/home/cloudsim/gazebo-logs": invalid volume specification: '/home/
ubuntu/code/simulator-logs/world_1_2017-06-06T00:40:25.393Z/gazebo-logs:/home/cloudsim/gazebo-logs'.
See 'docker run --help'.
content.html:
Thank you for the answer.

My fifth attempt was a bust - the simulator wouldn't start. This seemed like the most relevant log file: ubuntu@ip-172-31-23-53:~/code$ more cloudsim-docker.log xauth: unable to generate an authority file name xauth: file /tmp/.docker.xauth does not exist xauth: (argv):1: unable to read any entries from file "(stdin)" docker: Error response from daemon: invalid bind mount spec "/home/ubuntu/code/simulator-logs/world_1_2017-06-06T00:40:25.393Z/gazebo-logs:/home/cloudsim/gazebo-logs": invalid volume specification: '/home/ ubuntu/code/simulator-logs/world_1_2017-06-06T00:40:25.393Z/gazebo-logs:/home/cloudsim/gazebo-logs'. See 'docker run --help'.
